website_summaries.verdict: The Match is Mephisto's top-selling walking shoe for a reason. They're pricier than many other shoes, but they also seem to last much, much longer.
pros: Comes in black full-grain leather, dark brown and camel nubuck, navy nubuck, and tan full-grain leather at Zappos
Amazon offers a variety of colors
Anatomically correct construction for support when walking
Fine latex foam outsole, air-cushioned sole
cons: Outsoles are a little slippery at first

customer_reviews.title: You will not find more comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but well made and sturdy. By far the most comfortable shoes I have ever had for walking any distance. The look is a little prosaic, but at least they don't look cheap. I do a lot of walking on pretty rubbish feet, and I bought this pair to replace my old Mephistos, which I owned (and used a lot) for nearly ten years. In a search for variety, I would quite often walk into good shoe stores wearing them, and ask to try their best shoes. Invariably, the response was pretty much, "You're wearing them. Do you want to try a different color?".
customer_reviews.author: m b

customer_reviews.title: these are great. they have the most amazing cushion and feel
customer_reviews.text: these are great. they have the most amazing cushion and feel. Better than any other walking shoes I have tried and I have tried a lot of them. Update: after 9 months of intermittent wear, these shoes are still really comfortable and good. However, they are starting to look run down. I am not sure if the nubuck will ever look good enough even after refurbishment. If all you get out of the nubuck is 9 months, then these are grossly overpriced. I am wondering if the regular leather version would have been a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: 99999jj

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes and I can tell they are very well made. I took off a star because unlike what it says on their website there does appear to be a break in period. I have never experienced this with other Mephisto shoes. I have worn them for about an hour a day for the last week and they are finally becoming comfortable. Also as with all Mephisto shoes I find they run about a half size large. I normally wear an 11 1/2 but need an 11 with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: For $379 the laces should not break!
customer_reviews.text: For $379 the laces should not break! I have now gone through 3 sets of laces in a year so they are just bad. I need after market laces.
customer_reviews.author: Thank you all

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality, attractive walking shoe by Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very well made and VERY comfortable. The multi color was an attractive option but my purchase was made because of the comfort they provide. No break-in required. I have other Mephisto shoes and am completely happy with all of them. Mephisto's are more costly but worth it. I also learned I can send them in for re-soling when required and when they are returned they are basically as new. The cost is roughly 50% of the cost of new. Trouble is the shoes never seem to wear out. Phil
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: As we both wear the same size I was fortunate enough to be able to wear his for eight ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with my feet lately probably due to age (80). My brother recently visited and had a pair of these shoes. As we both wear the same size I was fortunate enough to be able to wear his for eight hours. Loved them. Ordered a pair and have been wearing them 10 hours a day for the last week. No break in time was necessary. Again, as my brother wore the same size shoe, I was very confident in ordering on-line. Shoe size of 10 1/2 was true to size. Will be ordering another style shortly.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Dad Hates Everything, But He Approved
customer_reviews.text: My 88-year old dad is notoriously hateful of all new things. However, even though he was insistent on wearing blown out 10 year old shoes despite his bad back, we bought these for him as a surprise. Initially he complained about them, but he now wears them, which is a success. My brother wore this brand shoes too and he loved them. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: Still good for me
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review about how the materials are different but the shoes feel the same to me. Extremely durable and comfortable to wear. The laces will wear after a year of use but that wasn't a surprise for me and have laces to use when they do. Price is ridiculous however and hopefully, competitors can match the quality of this product. These shoes last a few years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Joon

customer_reviews.title: These look fantastic and other than the leather breaking in some
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day, and walk a decent amount as well, and I was sick and tired of; replacing 80-120 dollar tennis shoes every year from wearing them out/them falling apart, and taking a second 'work pair' with me to the office (they don't think tennis shoes are office appropriate). These look fantastic and other than the leather breaking in some, haven't shown any real wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: The Mushroom Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes. Sturdy and comfortable shoes - very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Sturdy and comfortable shoes - very well made. The Mephisto Rush and Match shoes are very comfortable on feet even after walking in them for hours at a stretch. Since Mephisto Rush women's shoes have been discontinued, Mephisto Match men's shoes that are 2 sizes smaller than Mephisto Rush women's shoes match closely in size even though they are somewhat bulkier than Mephisto Rush women's shoes. Mephisto should restart making Mephisto Rush women's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tathagat

customer_reviews.title: Feels softer from the older models.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Mephisto Match. My last two pairs lasted about 8 years, then passed on to my son who got another year or two from them. The new shoes feel softer when walking-, but still an excellent shoe. The support is very good, as I have metatarsal foot pain and can not wear a cheaper shoe. Walk several miles a week.
customer_reviews.author: John and Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very well made shoes
customer_reviews.text: Toe box too short for my feet. Tried different sizes but not a good fit for me. My diabetes makes finding a good fit extremely difficult. My husband has been greatly satisfied with this same shoe for over 20 years. Never any problems even when brand new.
customer_reviews.author: 2Gypsies

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had them less than a week, but very comfortable so far. For their price, they need to be comfortable, though. Fit was as expected after reading reviews - my normal shoe size varies between Mens 11 and 12, depending on the shoe. This size 11 fits me perfectly. Great quality, and I expect them to last comfortably for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Koopster

customer_reviews.title: BEST WALKING SHOE ON THE PLANET
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Mephisto Match shoes! The arch support is perfect and it is the most comfortable walking shoe on the planet. This is my fourth pair. Mephisto will even do a complete rebuild - simply ship them to the AZ facility and they will return as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather told me once that for most things you should buy the middle of the line, but there are two things you should buy the best of...the best mattress and shoes. I find the Mephisto Match/Rush to be the best shoes I've ever own, and they corrected my foot pain. I still have a 16 year old pair of Women's Rush (the Rush was discontinued) that I just replaced with the men's Match. I found the switch to be equal in quality and comfort. These type of shoes are worth the investment in your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Williams

customer_reviews.title: Returned - way too large
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to get these, make sure you order 1 or 2 sizes DOWN from normal size. They are made way too large. Knowing this you will get a well made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: F R Frey

customer_reviews.title: Quality for price
customer_reviews.text: My Dad, bought a pair 15 yrs ago and they’re still good. He bought new ones because my Mom didn’t like how old they look, but they are still good to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived just as promised. Mephistos are pretty pricey, but they are by far my favorite brand. I always find them so comfortable - and this walking shoe is no different.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: function not fashion
customer_reviews.text: As someone who stands or walks much of the day, these are lifesavers. They are more comfortable than even running shoes and, while they are not stylish, they are appropriate for any office. This is my 2nd pair of this same shoe. I have had my brown pair refurbished twice and will finally have to replace them, so the price spreads out over a period of years. The multiple eyelets can accommodate thicker socks if necessary also. Lastly, these are my favorite shoes for travel.
customer_reviews.author: volfan

customer_reviews.title: Delight was all over his face upon my comment that ...
customer_reviews.text: My feet have been an big time problem all my life. I discovered Mephisto about 3 years ago. My podiatrist, whom I have visited every 2 months for years, never mentioned Mephisto to me before I brought it up to him. Delight was all over his face upon my comment that I planned to invest. That delight was reaffirmed through his verbal encouragement and comment. Total satisfaction so far.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: They are great.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are remarkably comfortable. They may be the best shoes I have in my closet. My wife has been trying to get me to wear Mephistos for years, so I finally gave in. Wives aren't always wrong after all.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Mephisto Match shoes for more then 25 years. Never have had any problems. I currently own 4 brand new pairs.
customer_reviews.author: James Fanslau

customer_reviews.title: mephisto match
customer_reviews.text: these mephistos are light & comfortable. they are casual, yet could even be worn for dress up. they are sturdy like a hiking boot, but are more like a high class sneaker. they are well worth the money & can be resoled at mephisto.com they wear like iron, yet have the most secure, supportive fit. they are truly the cadillac of shoes, once you wear them, thats all you will want to wear. i own 9 pairs of mephistos, (of which 7 are the match) so i added this pair of birch nubuck suede to my collection. also a year round shoe,cool in summer, warm in winter. simply the best!
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, I buy nice shoes but I have mostly been rewarded for spending a little bit more. These shoes are no exception and are quite possibly the best, in terms of comfort, shoes I've ever owned. If you are going to be doing a lot of walking or standing for long periods of time, I would strongly recommend you consider Mephisto Match Walking Shoes. Not crazy about the shoe laces but that's a pretty small thing in the overall scheme of things. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Martin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend the money especially because there were no retail shoe stores who carried a size 14. I know the Amazon return policy is excellent, however it takes time. The shoes fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I don't feel fatigued when traveling and trekking through airports and city streets. Money well spent and I love them. I love Amazon because I can finds items I can't otherwise find in a retail store and if I truly don't like it, their return policies are excellent. I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: San Martin

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit very well and accomodate custom orthotics
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Mephisto Match shoes before that have been rebuilt three times over a 15-year period. Replaced the shoes since Mephisto indicated they could not be rebuilt. Replacement shoes fit very well and accommodate my custom orthotics since my feet are different lengths and I have fallen arches. I find the match shoes to be very comfortable and a joy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Best overall shoe available.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe maker out there. Have 3 pair of them. Love the laces system, with steel loops. Makes my arthritic hands good to tie them. Construction is flawless. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Al

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair over 10+ years. I love the shoes. So comfortable. Great on ice. Only after about five years the rubber soles garden and get a little slippery. Great for walking city streets or mountain trails.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. My second pair. The first, I bought in 1998, and they are still fully functional. Just too small, as my feet have grown.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyKaye

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. The only difference between first and second pair is color. The last pair I wore an average of 3 times per week for three years. I wore them everywhere except to the office. They are supremely comfortable, solidly constructed and adjustable enough that when I was told I needed to wear therapeutic shoe inserts, they took them easily and remained comfortable. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Blumer

customer_reviews.title: MY SECOND PAIR
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SEVERAL PAIR OF MEPHISTO SHOES. THEY FIT WELL AND ARE VERY DURABLE. MY FIRST PAIR HAVE LASTED FOR THE PAST 5 YEARS BUT THE HEEL IS WEARING MORE THAN THE RUBBER SOLE. THESE SHOES ARE EXPENSIVE BUT WILL OUTLAST MOST SHOES. I LIKE THE BLACK BECAUSE THEY GO WITH JUST ABOUT ANY SLACKS. I WOULD LIKE THE CREME COLOR BUT NOT SURE HOW MUCH ABUSE OR SCUFFING THEY WOULD TAKE. I MAY TRY A PAIR IN THE FUTURE. MEPHISTOES ARE GREAT SHOES.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Runs a touch larger so I have to wear them a bit before the feet settle in. Other than that I'm quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: svcace

customer_reviews.title: Big toe hits side
customer_reviews.text: High quality but I'm having to have one shoe stretched so it won't hurt my big toe. I have had others of the same make for years with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: $300+ for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I never had paid this much for shoes! I have had surgery on one of my feet and have trouble with finding shoes that are soft and comfortable. These fit the bill. They are a little heavier than my 1st pair of Mephisto's, but the thicker soles are like walking on pillows. They also seem to provide extra room for my forefoot while still gripping the arch and heel. I am in the process of giving away my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Design and looks have gone downhill.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike changes in toe design, too stiff and tight Now unattractive.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best walking shoes I have ever had I have 4 pairs the oldest is more than 20 years old and still working. I have had resoling done. The only walking shoes that I can find that are resoleable.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support and quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 1/2 mens size. Fits my women size 9-10 feet perfectly. Looking forward to wearing them for walking on my upcoming trips. I love Mephisto shoes, almost all that I wear anymore. Expensive, but worth it for happy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy S.

customer_reviews.title: Thank,you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous fit and feel noting sole and shoe design are different than my first pair bought at Nordstrom several years ago, sending them in for the 90 dollar resole alternative in Nordstrom supplied mailing bag. Thanks so good to get my latest pair for 90$!!! from Amazon!!! You are the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: William I.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for older people who walk a lot
customer_reviews.text: Age 91, comfort and support. Replaced the same she I have had for 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Harry Burker

customer_reviews.title: A classic euuropean walking shoe, along with Mephisto sandles some of the most comfortable shoes made
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing the match and alternating with another slip on comfort shoe by 1803 for the last 10 years. These can be worn in and out of the office. The break in is short, perhaps a weekend, and otherwise uneventful. As a primary care provider who often worked 12 hour days, these shoes were a godsend. Comfortable, you bet!
customer_reviews.author: William Hansn

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Mephisto Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing Mephisto Boat Shoes for a few years, and this was his first pair of Match Walking Shoe. It fits perfectly, and is very comfortable from the minute you first put on. Wish it came in another Nubuck color, like a tan. The birch is nice, but he'd also like a tan or beige. Plan to take on a 2 week trip to California wine country.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just need to order additional shoelaces in case the present ones break. Matching the color is very important.
customer_reviews.author: Vazinho

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I wear them to work every day. They fit well and are comfortable for long walks. They are my go to shoes. Well crafted, long lasting, and good looking. Well worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Marx

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: With a back herniation at L4-L5, these shoes were recommended to me by my doctor. I have been wearing Mephistos since 2012 and I now own 4 pair. They are worth every penny. I can tell the difference between wearing less expensive shoes and Mephistos- my back, legs, and feet feel great with Mephistos, they ache with cheaper shoes. Mephistos are pricey but in the long run, cost less than medical visits, rehab, and medical procedures.
customer_reviews.author: Duane K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he has foot problems. He has worn them several times and finds them extremely comfortable. The sizing was perfect. They are a beautiful well made shoe, pricey, but when you can't walk what is price? I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: gd2bnmaine

customer_reviews.title: I have three pairs and they are the BEST shoe available
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of price, this model shoe is the very BEST! First day, I walked 10 miles in this new pair of shoes and no back or feet ache. I know they are expensive, but "bite the bullet" and you will never purchase any other shoe. I did add 1/2 larger size because I wear "sweat" socks. That 1/2 size increase really makes a big difference in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Hagearty II

customer_reviews.title: it is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The leather under the ankle is wearing a mark on my ankle. I added inserts as well, which provided even more support to a shoe that contained an ample amount. Other than these minute observations, it is a great shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Clyde wearer

customer_reviews.title: Good price prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto shoes though expensive and though too many to choose from wear extremely well. I researched their offerrings and this one in this one in this color is one of their most popular. The fit is great and so is the color. Mephisto's tend in to be a heavier shoe, but they last and can be refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: efrjr

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive; Mephisto says to buy the shoes a bit large, so I got a size 10 - but in reality a European 43 fits me perfectly - this was not an option where I bought them. Has a very rigid inner sole - but not as draconian as those from Finn Comfort. Given the expense and the fit compared to other manufacturers, I will not likely buy Mephisto shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Horn

customer_reviews.title: Everything okay on the purchase and shipment of the shoe,
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a shadow of its former self. I need to find a better mate shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Requested refund but never received it . This is not a regular fit and items are different from the pictures .
customer_reviews.author: saab

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 pairs of the brown shoes over the last 12 years and looking to diversify a little with the black. I took them with me on a five day trip to Chicago - right out of the box - new, the only shoes I brought. They were comfy from the first second. Its just a great shoe - if you walk a lot, which I do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The only shoes my feet seem to like to get into
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes my feet seem to like to get into. Not cheap, and probably not good to wear them all the time, since like all shoes, they wear down, and soon one will have to order another pair, but it took me literally 4 years and 3 months wearing them all the time, to have to buy new ones, and I have been traveling with them to many places, like Peru, Machu Picchu, Patagonia, Ireland, Germany, Denmark, Sweden and Spain.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Fuertes

customer_reviews.title: He says they are very comfortable and hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn these shoes for years and loves them. He says they are very comfortable and hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Third pair I've owned. Fit my foot where I need a wide toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's like walking on air... Truly wonderful investment for any walking professional.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Men's walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who has problems with his feet. We are going to Europe, and hopefully they will be comfortable. He has a hard time finding shoes because he has a narrow width, but these shoes seem to fit him just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: A great business, casual combination
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair in several years. A great business, casual combination. A very durable shoe. I have a very wide size 11 foot and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C T Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfortable. It is literally like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Ecstasy
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I wear these shoes decades ago? Foolish me. These shoes have a roomy toe box, provide great support on urban terrain and are the most comfortable shoes I have owned. The style is distinctive-I think of them as having character. I love em.
customer_reviews.author: paul shaw

customer_reviews.title: The shoe that has no peer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, but I'm 90 years old and my feet have changed so I just can't find a size that's comfortable. Believe me when I say that I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I have ankle and knee issues that make walking painful and I purchased these shoes for a recent trip to Europe. They are on the expensive side however I have purchased Mephisto shoes before and I do believe they are the best you can get. Other travelers on the trip recognized the shoes, approached me and voiced similar experiences. They are light yet give good solid support and they are durable and long lasting. The only reason I didn't give the product five stars is that my feet still hurt but in fairness, that is the fault of my anatomy and the shoes are great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: The tongue and the heel are reinforced with rigid plastic(?), so rigid I had a blister on my right heel and the tongue stuck into my foot. Almost $400. You expect something well made and designed. I won't buy anything Mephisto again.
customer_reviews.author: Fshxsv

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoe for walking & dress
customer_reviews.text: excellent shoe for walking & dress. shoe I purchased had small defect on it so it returned for credit. will purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: rockkit

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, supportive
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto’s are pricey, but worth every penny. It’s the only shoe I wear. Very comfortable, supportive shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe. Great construction and materials
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. Great construction and materials. Impressed with the flat sole to walk on . Add another insert for support and there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Jeanneret

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not quite a Cinderella fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the heft, balance, appearance and general comfort of the shoes. But I needed to add inserts to tighten them up and at least one of them still seems a bit large. But overall, I'm pretty happy with them and I plan to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R. Longini

customer_reviews.title: The fit, but also style. I've been using Mephistos for over 30 years
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers were just to tight in the toe area. Very uncomfortable. I have two other pairs of Mephistos on hand. They are very comfortable and perfectly satisfactory, but I no longer have the trust in the product that I once had
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F McCrea

customer_reviews.title: I simply love these shooes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair just like it almost 8 years. I changed soles and they were almost like new but everything has to end. So finally I decided to buy a new pair. They are simply just like the old one's just as good.
customer_reviews.author: CompUSA

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Match always comfortable. Nubuck color works well with darker colors of ...
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto Match always comfortable. Nubuck color works well with darker colors of casual pants.
customer_reviews.author: Cville VA Gal

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks of use — great shoe for casual wear.
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for everyday casual shoe. One of the best I've ever worn. Prompt and accurate service by this store.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS A REDESIGN
customer_reviews.text: The Mephisto Match is a well made shoe. But I do extensive walking and find the Match on the heavy side. I have an older pair, 20 years old, and had hoped that modern technology would lighten them up. But no! They may even be a tad heavier. The toe area is too wide for extensive walking. So I retutned them for the new less expensive Hotter design.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie E

customer_reviews.title: The construction and quality of this shoe is superb! ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction and quality of this shoe is superb! My husband, a senior, is on his feet, walking steep, inclined terrain throughout the day and this shoe gives him the support and comfort to do so! He's been wearing this brand of shoe for over twenty years. During a recent family reunion, our cousin arrived wearing the same shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Diane Lindegaard

customer_reviews.title: Ver good
customer_reviews.text: the Mephisto Men's Match Oxford, Desert Grain is one of the best shoe in my closet. it's the most comfortable among all other shoes. i wear the shoe all day long and sometimes, i forget that i have on a shoe. great value.
customer_reviews.author: kindle

customer_reviews.title: Only Shoes I Own
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, and the only kind that I have worn for years. Sooner or later, the stitching to either side of the ball of your foot begins to break, opening up the seams. By then, it's time to send them back for resole and repair. Even the stitching from the repair starts to break after a while. This would seem to be something that could be prevented to make the shoes absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Storystone

customer_reviews.title: The fit and that it is a Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fits just like the ones I use to get from Nordstom and cheaper. Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: My next shoes will be Mephisto too!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and quality. I am already looking for winter shoes by Mephisto. These are a cut above!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: was expecting the best but did not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable and disappointing, very uncomfortable arc support, maybe they will break-in after time. My SAS so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: karen lee fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice footwear
customer_reviews.text: $300.00 seems like a lot of money for a pair of shoes, but I have been very happy with these. They are very comfortable for everyday use and walking.
customer_reviews.author: JimVZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 12 W foot even though they are marked 12 D.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He still wears an old pair he bought 20 years ago. They're nice looking, yet perfect for traversing even the most sophisticated cities and cobblestone streets.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Where is the wide size??
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide EEE. I have another pair same style. Last is exactly the same. I expect after some wear they will become as comfortable as my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. This is exactly what I have been searching for as I am on my feet walking hours a day. They are pricey but with the resole capabilities the price is reasonable. I have already bought a second pair (different style) and was equally impressed!
customer_reviews.author: rudj@earthlink.net

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Comfort Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband has terrible feet and these shoes are more comfortable than most and are stylish as well. They are expensive, but you get what you pay for as the materials are high quality and based on previous experiences with Mephisto should be quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: must love dogs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this specific shoe model now for many years. Pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: reader_jones

customer_reviews.title: thanks you for the only shoe so far to accomodate my pretty impaired foot for very long days
customer_reviews.text: with a collapsed Talus I am challenged to find shoes that support and at the same time not put too much pressure on the top of the foot. I have literally gone through over 100 different shoes and the Mephisto Match is the only one I can wear all day (long work hours keep me up for18 to 22 hours every day) Thank you so much for a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: top shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had Mephisto shoes before, many years ago. When first I put them on last week I was taken aback by their weight. I got used to them right quick. Now I can have them on all day. My feet are not as tired as before. The soles of my feet tingle all over. Ecellent purchase. I will order more in different colors
customer_reviews.author: Petrus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable but supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, comfortable but supportive shoe. Worth the price. This is my second pair, and the first is still great two years later.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good fitting shoe. This brown one has a softer leather than the black that I also purchased. It fits better and gives great support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Mephisto!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Mephistos as well as a competitor's brand (much less!), and there was no comparison - these were far superior in fit, comfort and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mukund G

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: These are quality shoes. They fit well, wear well and are well-worth their price. I have worn Mephisto shoes now for 30 years and for 20 of those years they were every day shoes to work. Now that I am retired, I don't even know how long they will last! Perhaps I shouldn't say this but maybe these one will last indefinitely. They are stylish and comfortable at the same time. I have no reservations about recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: michael kornecook

customer_reviews.title: I wear a brace or AFO om one foot
customer_reviews.text: and normally buy $800 shoes. When I heard about Mephesto shoes by my orthopedists, I had to try them out and I'm glad I did. Some what heavy, but the only shoe I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Bishof

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND LOves these shoes. This his 3rd pair. He is very hard on shoes and these wear extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I own. The quality is amazing. I'm so happy I finally bought them! Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FLP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best that I have ever had . I will order more at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ginder

customer_reviews.title: Happy that I Purchased  Mephisto Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes is the most expensive shoes I have ever purchased. I decided to try the Mephisto because I have spent about 2 years looking for a new pair of shoes without success. I normally purchase Ecco shoes, which I have worn for years. Mephisto claims "it is the world's finest footwear. I decided to put it to the test. After wearing these shoes for several days, I am convinced! High quality grained leather, a very comfortably designed footbed and an exception designed method of shoe lace management.. I have now found a great new pair of well fitting, comfortable walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Kantor MD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for husband who stands and teaches all day. He says their the most comfortable shoes he has-he has 2nd pair in brown. Have worn well, great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mechsner

customer_reviews.title: These shoes rock!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light and comfortable and take some strain off my lower back. Very good quality. If you have the means I recommend these ...
customer_reviews.author: zoso967

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase. Finish tends to look tired after three ...
customer_reviews.text: Repeat purchase. Finish tends to look tired after three years traveling around the world in all climatic conditions. Probably should have purchased an additional pair this time just in case they become scarce.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for life
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, worth the price, especially since you can resole them, which is not an option with so many fo the newer shoe designs. Maybe not as flagrantly stylish as some, but give me comfort and durability any day...and they ARE pretty cool in an understated way...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mephisto Men's Match Walking Shoe
product_meta.description:
Comfort walking shoes. Both feet should be measured, as most people have one foot which is larger than the other. It’s also a good idea to measure your feet at the end of the day as they are usually slightly larger at that time. Please keep in mind length is only one dimension. Feet are three-dimensional, so width and thickness of the feet should also be considered.

This casual oxford from Mephisto is a perfect Match. The durable leather upper and laid-back style are great for relaxed outings and everyday wear, while the Soft-Air Technology and Caoutchouc rubber sole give you comfort and support where you need it most.

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto's natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.

See more
feature_bullets: Soft-Air Technology for soft walking comfort--provides affective shock-absorption and protects your joints, and vertebrae
Caoutchouc rubber outsole retains flexibility - will not harden or crack over time
